nodes.excerpt: I stumbled upon some videos of the Mandelbrot set on YouTube, and I was instantly fascinated by it. The shape of the set is so intriquing…
An explanation of the mathematical approach can be found in this blog post: Plotting the Mandelbrot set This is an app for visualization of…

frontmatter.title: Mandelbrot set visualizer
frontmatter.description: A Mandelbrot and Julia set visualizer made in WebGL
